name: GetMemberWorkspaces
description:
Retrieve a member's Trello workspaces.

This tool retrieves the list of workspaces (organizations) associated with a specific Trello member.

parameters.name: member_id_username
parameters.description: The Trello member's ID or username to retrieve workspaces for.

value_schema.description: The ID or username of the member

parameters.name: workspace_visibility_filter
parameters.description: Filter the workspaces by visibility: 'all', 'members', 'none', or 'public'. 'members' filters to only private workspaces.

value_schema.description: One of: `all`, `members`, `none`, `public` (Note: `members` filters to only private Workspaces)

parameters.name: organization_fields
parameters.description: Specify 'all' or a comma-separated list of organization fields such as 'id', 'name'.

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of organization [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: include_paid_account_info
parameters.description: Include paid account details in the returned workspace information if true.

value_schema.description: Whether or not to include paid account information in the returned workspace object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: One of: `all`, `members`, `none`, `public` (Note: `members` filters to only private Workspaces)

value_schema.description: One of: `all`, `members`, `none`, `public` (Note: `members` filters to only private Workspaces)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of organization [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

value_schema.description: `all` or a comma-separated list of organization [fields](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/object-definitions/)

parameters.name: paid_account
parameters.description: Whether or not to include paid account information in the returned workspace object

value_schema.description: Whether or not to include paid account information in the returned workspace object

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or username of the member

value_schema.description: The ID or username of the member
